reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: What a great plastic free option for tampons! If you usually buy o.b., you will like these tampons. I love that these are organic and the tub they come in is so cute. Plus the company gives the money to charity, so I'm supporting a good cause at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Here we Flo Regular & Super No Applicator Cotton Tampons: Convenient but Uncomfortable
reviews.reviewText: The Here we Flo Regular & Super No Applicator Cotton Tampons offer a convenient solution for on-the-go menstrual care. Their compact size makes them easy to carry in a purse or bag, ensuring that you're always prepared. While the convenience factor is a major plus, I must admit that the tampons' discomfort during insertion warrants a three-star rating.One of the standout features of the Here we Flo Cotton Tampons is their compact size. The absence of an applicator allows for a more discreet and portable design, making them ideal for keeping in your purse or pocket. Their small form factor ensures they take up minimal space, providing a practical solution for women on the move.However, when it comes to the comfort of insertion, the Here we Flo Cotton Tampons leave much to be desired. Without an applicator, the process can feel somewhat challenging and even uncomfortable. The absence of a smooth, guided entry can result in a less-than-optimal experience, which can be frustrating, particularly for those who are new to using non-applicator tampons.While personal experiences may vary, some users have described the sensation of insertion as feeling akin to inserting a bullet into the vagina. This uncomfortable comparison can be off-putting for those seeking a more comfortable menstrual care option. It's essential to note that everyone's anatomy is different, and some individuals may find the insertion process more manageable and less uncomfortable than others.Aside from the discomfort during insertion, the Here we Flo Cotton Tampons perform well in terms of absorbency and leakage prevention. They effectively absorb menstrual flow, providing reliable protection. The cotton material is gentle against the skin, reducing the risk of irritation.In terms of eco-friendliness, these tampons are made of cotton, which is a biodegradable and renewable resource. This aspect appeals to those seeking more sustainable menstrual product options.Overall, the Here we Flo Regular & Super No Applicator Cotton Tampons offer convenience and portability, making them suitable for women on the go. However, the discomfort experienced during insertion can be a significant drawback, impacting the overall satisfaction of using these tampons. It's important to consider personal comfort levels and preferences when deciding whether to use non-applicator tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great tampons and much easier to unwrap
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are the best I've bought so far, nice and soft and great shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Wrapped in plastic, smaller than other brands
reviews.reviewText: On the pictures you can see a version of the 2 sizes in the pack and their version with the applicator, plus a tampax green and a Lil lets green, big size difference, other than that they are comfortable and seem to do their ob, just remember that a super is more like a regular, a shame that you can't buy boxes of just one size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these tampons and love that they are good for the planet. Lots of these reviews say the applicator and wrapper is plastic but it's not true, they are plant-based! Love how comfy they are too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't get my usual organic tampons so tried these. They're fine but smaller than my usual brand which means I have to change them more often. Will be fine for lighter days though.
